quote: Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth. – Henry David Thoreau
fact: 98% of all murders and rapes are by a close family member or friend of the victim.
joke:
Hostess: Do you have a preference of where you sit?
Dad: Down.
